comment: i picked up a class with no prof and got dr bec. she was so great im taking her again for genetics! she's so sweet and considerate even when i took a sick leave. she grades reports for completion and ur only graded on pre lab quizzes which are SO EASY and ur research poster which is done in groups. her final was easy and i didn't even study!

Dr. Bec cares about your learning above your grade. She's compassionate and available outside class (emails quick). Personable, easy to talk with and ask questions. Reports due shortly after lab (couple days) so be ready, though they're fairly easy. Goes over many answers before you start so if you pay attention you will do well! Fun lab!

Friendly professor, straightforward content. Only one worksheet and 2 quizzes per week, which can all be completed during or right after the lab. Attendance mandatory, but sometimes make-up labs are available if you miss one. Do not abuse her leniency though
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I LOVED Dr. Keall! She was very approachable, friendly, and easy to talk to. The labs were easy and she answered questions well. Overall she was great and I would take her if you can.

Dr. Keall was the absolute BEST teacher I've ever had at KSU. She is super understanding and is always willing to help you out. No matter how silly you think the question may seem, she is always happy to assist in any way possible. If I could take her class again i'd do it in a heartbeat.

Dr. Keall is an AMAZING professor, and I loved taking her lab this semester! She explains the lab thoroughly and makes sure that you understand it. She's also super approachable and kind, so don't be afraid to ask questions. The lab is not difficult, and she truly sets you up for success. She's the best, and I honestly wish I could take her again!

Love her so much! Wish that she taught Bio Lab 2, so I could take her again! She explains in depth every single lab, and is always ready to answer questions. Her rubrics are so easy, and she explains them so we can get max points. She takes most of the lab worksheets for completion, and drops the lowest post and pre quiz! Take her, she's the best!!
